text: The Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actor – Motion Picture is an annual award. It is a Golden Globe Award. It is given by Hollywood Foreign Press Association. The following actors have won multiple awards: Richard Attenborough (consecutive), Edmund Gwenn, Martin Landau, Edmond O'Brien, Brad Pitt, and Christoph Waltz.
